entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Varennes

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with light snow changing to light snow overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
